thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Always a pleasure
thread.title_full: Always a pleasure - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: rfdaag
title: Always a pleasure
text:
I am in NYC several times a year on business and always stay at this hotel. Staff is friendly and very accommodating. They have also noted my preferences so I get the room I like. It's a well-appointed boutique type hotel.
Room Tip: Ask for a higher floor to get more light. See more room tips
